de.ddkfm.util

Class MicroIIUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ddkfm.util.MicroIIUtils

  • public class MicroIIUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class with useful methodes which are occurs many times in the Micro application

      • loadingLogger

        public static void loadingLogger()
        loading the Logger from a outer configuration(config/logging.xml) or from the inner configuration und reload them

      • getBinaryString

        public static boolean[] getBinaryString(int i)
        return the binary notion from a given integer value (only 4 bit)
        Parameters:
        i - the given integer value
        Returns:
        returns the binary notation as an arrays of boolean values

      • getStringByBinaryNotation

        public static java.lang.String getStringByBinaryNotation(boolean[] values)
        Returns a String representation of a given boolean array
        Parameters:
        values - an array of boolean values
        Returns:
        the binary String (as regex: (0|1)*)

      • getBinaryNotationByString

        public static boolean[] getBinaryNotationByString(java.lang.String inputString)
        the reverse function of getStringByBinaryNotation which gets a boolean array on a given binary string
        Parameters:
        inputString - a given binary which should be in binary notation( in regex: (0|1)*)
        Returns:
        the boolean array, if the binary String is not matched with the regex then is will be return null

      • getIntegerByBinaryNotation

        public static int getIntegerByBinaryNotation(boolean[] values)
        returns the integer value of a boolean array
        Parameters:
        values - given boolean values
        Returns:
        a integer value. if the boolean array is empty then 0 will return

      • getIntegerByBinaryString

        public static int getIntegerByBinaryString(java.lang.String binaryString)
        See Also:
        parseInt(binaryString, 2)

      • invert

        private static boolean[] invert(boolean[] values)
        invert a given boolean array (0->1, 1->0) (one's complement)
        Parameters:
        values - a boolean array
        Returns:
        the inverted boolean array

      • twosComplement

        public static boolean[] twosComplement(int digit)
        return a boolean array by a given integer value
        Parameters:
        digit - if digit is positive then the binary notation will return else the digit will be transformed into binary, inverted and added by one
        Returns:
        if the given digit is negative then the two's complement will be return

      • getApplicationProperties

        public static java.util.Properties getApplicationProperties()
        return the application.properties(config/application.properties or /de/ddkfm/util/application.properties) as Properties object
        Returns:
        properties will be empty if the application.properties not exists

      • getApplicationProperty

        public static java.lang.String getApplicationProperty(java.lang.String key)
        return the specific Property from application.properties by key

      • getThemePath

        public static java.lang.String getThemePath()
        return the Path for the Themes depending on the application.properties
